author: Staff Reporter
text:
A motorcyclist was killed in a hit-and-run accident on Mount – Poonamallee Road early on Thursday.

Sivasankar (38), a software engineer working in an IT company in Porur, was returning home on his motorcycle after night shift, traffic police sources said. When he was approaching St. Thomas Mount, he was hit by an unknown vehicle. He was a resident of Nanmnagalam, police said. A search is on for the driver.
title: Motorcyclist killed in hit-and-run
